籤詩版本二:
E ʻoluʻolu a me ka lokomaikaʻi i ke komo ʻana a i waho, e kūpaʻa a hilinaʻi, a e hoʻolohe i kāu ʻōlelo.
ʻAʻole maopopo a mālie ka noʻonoʻo, aia ka lā ʻulaʻula ma waena
詩意:
Hōʻike kēia hexagram i ke kiʻi o ka lā ʻulaʻula e ʻā ana i ka lewa.
Hele nā ​​mea a pau e like me ka hoʻolālā.
解曰: ʻAʻohe mea i ka manaʻo. Maʻemaʻe ka wai o ka hāʻule. ʻAʻole pono e kānalua. Hana maoli nā mea.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Hoʻohiki kaikunāne ʻo Taoyuan
I ka pau ʻana o ka moʻokūʻauhau Han Hikina, ua haunaele ka honua, a ʻo ka poʻe ʻaihue Turban Melemele e hoʻāla i nā wahi a pau.
ʻO Liu Bei, Guan Yu a me Zhang Fei, ʻekolu mau kānaka me nā manaʻo kiʻekiʻe, ua like ko lākou manaʻo a ua hilinaʻi kekahi i kekahi ma kā lākou ʻōlelo a me kā lākou hana no ka manaʻo maikaʻi e hana pū i kahi hana nui. , a ua mālama lākou i ka hana ma ka māla pua peach (ʻo Songlindian Town i kēia manawa, Zhuozhou City, Hebei Province). kūpono no ka ho'ōla hou ʻana i ka moʻokūʻauhau Han. Ua lilo lāua ʻekolu i mau kaikunāne hoʻohiki, ʻo Malaki ia a ua mohala ka pua peach.
聖意: ʻO ka palekana home, ka waiwai, ka waiwai, nā pilikia kālepa, ka male ʻana, ka pōʻino, ka poʻe hele wāwae e ālai ana i nā mahina ʻai, nā enuhe silika, nā holoholona, ​​nā poʻe nalo, nā hoʻopiʻi, poho, neʻe, conservativeness, nalowale waiwai, maʻi, hoʻonohonoho, hoʻouna i ka hale kupapaʻu mauna, pōmaikaʻi.
第X籤: He kanakolukūmāhā i lanakila i ka hailona (lotting)
